Class Hole

java.lang.Object
  CircleObject
      Hole

public class Hole
extends CircleObject

An Object that exists in the pinball machine. If other balls come in contact with it, the ball loses all points. If the size of the ball is the same or smaller than the hole then the ball is removed from the simulation.
